flawed_nl_solution:
The price of one performance is 3 * $5 = $<<3*5=51>>51.
Mark intends to go to the theater once a week, so in 9 weeks he will spend 6 * $51 = $<<6*51=306>>306.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
